high_descs: turn right and walk past the bed. turn right and walk forward.  turn right at the pillows
Pick up a pillow from the bed
turn right a walk past the bed. make a left and walk to the edge of the bed. turn left and walk to the lamp.
anns.task_desc: look at a pillow with the lamp light.

high_descs: Go right and then right again and then turn right to face the bed.
Pick the pillow on the left up from the bed.
Go around the bed and turn to face the night stand on the right side of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pillow and turn a light on.

high_descs: Move right, then right again facing the pillows on the bed
Pick up the white pillow on the left side
Carry the pillow to the opposite side of the bed where the night stand is
Turn on the lamp on the night stand
anns.task_desc: Carry a pillow while turning on a lamp
